Package cz.praguecityuniversity

package cz.praguecityuniversity
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ConfigurationReader
    Interface allowing multiple implementations of reading a config file
    EventHandler
    Every Entity that works with events has to implement handleEvent to be able to process its events through the EventScheduler.
    IPAddress
    Interface allowing for multiple IP protocols.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CabledConnection
    Cabled connection that can be attached to an ethernet network adapter on each side.
    ConfigurationReaderXML
    Configuration reader for XML files.
    Connection
    Connection between devices.
    ConnectionDecorator
    Allows for decorating of connections.
    CorruptConnection
    Corrupts the message going through a connection.

  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    EmptyRoutingTable
     
    EventFinished
    Thrown when this is the last event to be processed
    InvalidIPAddress
    Thrown when an Invalid IP address is provided to IPAddressFactory.
    InvalidMask
    Thrown when the provided IP mask isn't within the correct range.
    InvalidPortInterface
     
    IPVersionNotRecognized
    Thrown when IP address does not match IPv4 or IPv6 protocols.
    NotImplemented
    Thrown for components that are not yet implemented.
    RouteNotFound
